item.description: Billionaire Mukesh Ambani is aiming to take India’s largest wireless carrier public by the first-half of 2026, as Reliance Industries Ltd. looks to unlock shareholder value and provide an exit route f

item.title: Reliance Said to Seek Small Float in Jio IPO, Raising $6 Billion
item.description: Reliance Industries Ltd. is proposing to sell just 5% of its Jio telecommunications unit in a potential listing that may raise more than $6 billion, people familiar with the matter said.

item.title: Reliance Said to Seek Small Float in Jio IPO, Raising $6 Billion
item.description: Reliance Industries Ltd. is proposing to sell just 5% of its Jio telecommunications unit in a potential listing that may raise more than $6 billion, people familiar with the matter said.

item.title: Ambani’s Reliance In Focus Amid EU Sanctions on Russia Oil
item.description: The oil-procurement patterns of India’s Reliance Industries Ltd. are coming under scrutiny after the European Union announced new restrictions on diesel made from Russian crude.

item.description: Reliance Industries Ltd.’s quarterly profit beat estimates as the billionaire Mukesh Ambani-led conglomerate benefited from a massive one-time gain after divesting its stake in India’s biggest paints

item.title: Reliance’s $40 Billion Gain Fuels Best Run Over Nifty Since 2020
item.description: Reliance Industries Ltd.’s shares are outperforming the country’s benchmark stocks gauge by their widest margin in five years, driven by optimism over the conglomerate’s diversified businesses.
